nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: Doodle Activity Book
LEGO Star Wars: Doodle Activity Book is a LEGO coloring and activity book released by Scholastic Inc. on November 29, 2016 in the United States.

Part activity book, part coloring/doodle book, all LEGO(R) Star Wars(TM) fun! A brand new format for LEGO Star Wars, part activity book, part coloring/doodle book, coming on the heels of Star Wars: Rogue One!
